title: Myths of the World-Born of Clay and Fire (CE) [Wendy99]~Maraya21
description:
Myths of the World 8: Born of Clay and Fire (CE) (HOG) ~ Maraya21
 
http://i.imgur.com/HDwtpAs.jpg

A mysterious creature is wreaking havoc in your home city of Prague, and only you have the power to stop it! After your father is arrested, you find out just what he had been researching in his hidden alchemy lab â€“ the Clayborne, powerful mythical monsters, born from clay and fire. Now it's up to you to discover the true nature of the Clayborne and save the city from destruction in this epic hidden-object puzzle adventure!

Features:
- Thwart an old enemy's scheme to unleash a slumbering ancient power in the bonus chapter!
- Collect animal alchemy symbols to reveal hidden lore!
- Earn achievements to prove your skill.
- Spot morphing objects in HOPs, and find fire symbols hidden in the game.
- Unlock beautiful wallpapers, soundtracks, concept art, and more!

System Requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
CPU: 2.0 GHz
RAM: 1024 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 942 MB


Torrent dead? __ Torrent DMCA'ed? __  You have a problem with the game/file not working/opening? __ There is a game you desire to play like crazy but is not uploaded?
Then go to the sites i upload and contact me to help out.

Please be aware that i want to seed 24h/d, however with a really old laptop, a connection of U:80.0 kB/s and multiple seeds 
simultaneously my contribution will not be enough. Therefore, please seed what you leeched. Fair-Share
Enjoy!                Maraya21
